title: Mario Breakout
description: Our project is a Mario-themed twist on the classic 'Breakout' game. Control a platform to bounce a ball, breaking blocks until none are left. A blend of timeless fun and retro nostalgia, reimagined for a modern touch!

title: Pokedex
description: Pokedex project. Full stack application built with React, JSON Server, and React Testing Library

title: Cohort Tools
description: Bootcamp group project. Full stack application built with React, Node, ExpressJS,  MongoDB, and Tailwind.

title: Weather Dashboard
description: Weather tracking application built with React, Node, ExpressJS, MongoDB, Ant Design, and OpenWeather API.
